tidbits.title: Progressive Policies
tidbits.description: Uruguay is known for its progressive social policies, including legalizing cannabis, same-sex marriage, and strong social welfare programs.

tidbits.title: Cultural Heritage
tidbits.description: The country has a rich cultural heritage, seen in its music, dance (such as the tango and candombe), literature, and vibrant artistic scene.

tidbits.title: Beaches and Natural Beauty
tidbits.description: Uruguay offers beautiful beaches along the Atlantic coast, charming colonial towns like Colonia del Sacramento, and diverse natural landscapes.
